plan: Book a round‑trip flight from Boston to Los Angeles on 10/5 with return on 10/8.
success_criteria: Flight search results for Boston to Los Angeles on 10/5/2023 with return 10/8/2023 are displayed.
Booking page for the chosen flight loads successfully.

steps.details: Enter "Los Angeles" into the destination field.
Set the departure date to 10/5 and return date to 10/8.
Select the preferred flight from the results and proceed to booking.
